runs.comm: Fernando starts with a good ball, quick and short of a length, Warner jumps back to defend
short ball and Warner hooks it through square leg, but doesn't time it, he was surprised by the extra pace
another very fast bouncer! Great start from Fernando, and Clarke's attempted hook misses
almost played on! Clarke gets a thick inside edge past the stumps and down to fine leg to get off the mark
swing and a miss! Fernando gives Clarke a bit of width outside off, and it's a slower ball, Warner's airy drive doesn't connect
beaten, this one sails over the stumps and Warner's cross-bat shot doesn't connect
Clarke drives but mistimes and can't beat mid on
oops! That's a chest-high full toss from Malinga, which is a scary prospect, but it was well down leg and the slower ball, which came out of the hand all wrong
nudge and run stuff from Clarke, he prods to cover and takes off for a quick single
well wide of off stump, David Warner couldn't reach that and it's called a wide
that's a crunching drive from Warner, a 142kph half-volley from Malinga, but the batsman couldn't beat Murali at mid off
driven to mid off again, and this is good tight stuff from Sri Lanka
that's the slower one from Malinga, Warner waits on it and drives to long off

run-out missed! Clarke pushes to cover and takes off, Warner shouts a very loud "Nooooo!" and Clarke turns back, the throw from Dilshan missed the stumps and lucky for Clarke - he was out by a good metre or more, and then there was an overthrow
crunched off the bat and Mathews at point makes a great save
width, and a lot of it, but Clarke's cut does not beat point, and the Sri Lankans have been sharp in the field so far
and there's the first boundary of the innings, Clarke gets one just short of a length and pulls confidently through midwicket, where there is quite a gap
good ball, very good inswinging yorker at 143kph and Clarke keeps it out
Clarke waits on this one and cuts late, third man does the fielding and there's just the single
gone! Fernando breaks through; Warner has thrown everything at this one, trying to slog over mid-on but he's skied it off the toe of the bat and Perera at mid-off takes the catch
Watson clips confidently through midwicket to get off the mark
lovely shot from Clarke! He's made use of the field restrictions, advancing to Murali and lofts a drive over long-off for six, that was a really terrific shot
advances again, drives to cover
clipped to midwicket, Clarke can't beat the field, he's using his feet against Murali
driven in the air through the vacant mid-on
quick stuff from Murali, 92kph on the stumps, and Watson pushes to midwicket
shortish ball, Clarke pulls and can't beat midwicket
crunched to cover and again can't find the gap
Clarke walks across outside off this time and pushes a single through cover
good bounce from Perera, Watson tries to upper cut that one over gully but it sails past the edge through to Sangakkara
nudged towards mid on and Watson gets a single

what a catch! Dilhara Fernando has just plucked an incredible take over his head! Clarke backed away and tried to slam it over the bowler's head, Fernando running back from mid-on had totally misjudged it and it seemed to be sailing over his head, but at the last minute he's thrown his right hand up and taken it!
clipped to midwicket, can't beat the field
nudged to point
on the back foot, Hussey punches a drive through extra cover and gets three runs
Watson uses his crease, goes right back onto his stumps and drives through mid-on
pushed away through point
driven wide of mid-on, Hussey gets a single
driven to cover, Hussey can't beat the field
slower ball and short of a length, Hussey waits on it and cuts fine
good ball, attacking the stumps and Watson defends with a thick inside edge that runs away to square leg
Hussey pushes through the gap between point and cover, nice placement
skied and taken by Murali at long-off! Watson tries to go over the top but it's another one off the toe of the bat, and Murali makes no mistake - what a start by Sri Lanka!
Hussey waits on this and opens the face to guide it behind point
Randiv strikes first ball! Hussey looks to cut but is surprised by the bounce from Randiv's topspinner, an edge is well taken by Sangakkara. This is really unravelling for Australia.
nudged to midwicket and he's off the mark
this one drifts down leg side, White glances and gets off the mark
beautiful ball! Really sharp offspin from Randiv and Haddin was surprised by that, it's turned in and struck him on the body
dropped by Sangakkara, but it was a very tough one down leg side, Haddin got plenty of bat on that
on the back foot, worked to long on
guided to backward point, can't beat the field
soft hands from White, he waits on a straight one and nudges through midwicket for a single
straight bat from Haddin, he defends, this is good bowling from Perera
down leg side, Haddin glances away to fine leg
clipped off the hips for a single
pushed back down the pitch, can't get a run
that was an ugly whack from White, but effective, he's backed away and thumped it in the air through cover
good sharp turn again from Randiv, Haddin doesn't have much idea and takes it on the pad
too short, Haddin cuts square
tossed up this time and White drives to cover, Jayawardene misfields and allows two runs to the man in the deep
White uses the feet, clips to midwicket and can't find a gap
powerful sweep from White, but straight to the man at deep square leg
Malinga strikes first ball! Short and wide, White's eyes light up but the extra bounce surprises him, his cut turns into a thin edge through to Sangakkara
edged and just short of slip, who has come in for the new batsman. Gosh, that could so easily have gone to hand!
good yorker, swinging it back in a touch, and Malinga wants an lbw but that was sliding down leg
bouncer, Smith tries to hook but can't get anything on that. Half a shout from Sangakkara, who thought there may have been a tickle on that
down leg side, Smith clips it to deep square leg and gets off the mark
driven to cover, can't beat the field
tossed up outside off, it's driven through cover for a single
good ball, turning back in to Haddin, who defends
Haddin waits on this one and guides it fine to third man
Smith sweeps, safely in the air but there's a sweeper in the deep

great shot! Haddin has struck what is, incredibly, the third boundary of the innings, a proper straight drive that comes off the middle of the bat and beats long on and long off, who converge in their attempts to cut it off
late cut this time, well played Haddin, but Australia need a lot more from him to turn this into a competitive total
good running from Smith and Haddin, they pick up two from what was just a well-placed nudge through midwicket
square cut from Smith, but the man at deep point cuts it off
Haddin waits on this and opens the face for a late cut
finally, a six! Smith opens up his stance and muscles the ball over midwicket, for a minute it looked like Randiv in the deep might have a chance but it's lobbed just over the boundary
driven down the ground this time
this time it's Haddin who throws the bat, his heave becomes a top edge that slices over gully and lands safely
clipped off the pads behind square leg
wrong line, down leg side and called a wide
ah, a bit of good fortune for Haddin, who looks to sweep through square leg and just gets a little under-edge that races away to fine leg
run-out chance goes begging - Haddin cuts late and is turned back going for the quick single, the under-arm throw to Sangakkara is too wide and a diving Haddin makes his ground
Haddin goes back into his crease and clips to midwicket
Haddin gets this one off the middle of the bat! He's thrust the front leg forward and slammed a straight drive back over Murali's head for a boundary
defended away safely
slower ball on the stumps, Smith picks it though and drives wide of mid off
that's a big one! Fernando gives Haddin a half-volley and Haddin says thanks very much, lifts it high and hard over long-on and that ball crashes into the fence
Haddin goes for it again, but doesn't connect this time and it sails through to the keeper
half a shout as Haddin drives outside off and there's a noise as it flies through to Sangakkara, but that might just have been bat on ground
shorter ball now and Haddin turns it through midwicket with a sort of swivel pull
Smith backs away and Fernando follows him, Smith flicks it through square leg and picks up a single
Smith advances to Murali and works it behind square leg
short and down leg, not a good ball, but Haddin manages to pick out the man at deep square leg on the bounce
action aplenty here, Smith advances and drives hard, his edge flies short of gully, the throw doesn't find him short, and after all that it was just a dot ball
lucky boundary - Smith gets a thick inside edge to fine leg, Murali beat him with genuine offspin there
punched to gully for a quick single
worked away through square leg and that's the 50 partnership between Smith and Haddin, which was much needed by Australia after their top order struggled
tries for the yorker and it turns into a low full toss on the pads, Haddin glances it away and Fernando at short fine leg knocks it down without stopping it properly
pushed to mid-on, Murali picks up and shies at the non-striker's end but there wasn't a run-out on there
super shot! Smith gets down to lift that over his shoulder with a ramp shot, fine leg was up in the circle so that one sailed safely down towards the boundary, really clever batting
Smith looks to back away, Malinga fires it wide of off and Smith stretches to cut through point
slower delivery this time, Haddin guides a single behind point
another slower one, Smith punches through cover
aggression from Smith, he's advanced and thumped that over the bowler's head but doesn't quite time it, long on gets around to cut it off
what a shot! Smith's gone down for the reverse sweep and lifted it high over the infield and safely down to the boundary
oh, good bowling from Randiv! Smith dances down the pitch and Randiv holds that ball back a little, doesn't impart much spin and it beats the bat, Smith is comprehensively stumped
waits on this ball and cuts behind point to get off the mark
two wickets in the over! Haddin's gone for the slog sweep and hasn't quite got enough on that, Mathews at deep midwicket takes a comfortable catch, Randiv gets another one
McKay defends back down the pitch
short and fast, Hastings hasn't much idea about that and lets it go through to Sangakkara. Oh, that's been called a wide, that's simply not the right decision, it was only head height
good yorker, Hastings keeps it out and jabs a single to mid on
punched to mid off, McKay can't beat the field, good full bowling from Malinga
oops, down leg side and that's justifiably called a wide
shortish and at the body, McKay tries to pull and it's much quicker onto him than he expected, does get bat on ball though and lobs a single to square leg
slower ball, Hastings picks it and pushes a single to cover, Kapugedera shies at the bowler's end and misses, that would have been a run out
slower ball, and it's a swing and a miss as McKay tries to slam it back over the bowler's head
down leg side again, even further this time and that's the third wide of the over
pretty well played there by McKay, he's manufactured a boundary by walking across his stumps and lifting a half-volley off middle over midwicket
Hastings backs away and gets that one off the toe of the bat over point, picks up a couple of handy runs
shorter and at the body, Hastings guides it off the face of the bat to third man
McKay backs off and drives hard down the ground, but long off cuts it off easily
very useful runs! Hastings backs away and slashes hard, a thick outside edge flies away to third man for a boundary
oh, good batting from Hastings, again he's backed away and this time Fernando follows the batsman, but fine leg is up and Hastings flicked that one through the gap and safely away to the boundary
crunched through cover and the batsmen come back for an ambitious two, the throw finds Hastings short diving back into his ground, he's unselfishly run out trying for that final run
